GSD.description:
perf hist: Fix memory leak of a perf_hpp_fmt

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.257 by commit c5c8a26c0dc69a400553245e92d741fe55f91095. For more details please see the references link.
